DOC.brief_summary: To demonstrate single dose Makena® deliver SQ via auto-injector comparable bioavailability single IM injection Makena® .
DOC.brief_title: Comparing Bioavailability When Preservative-free Makena® ( Hydroxyprogesterone Caproate Injection , 250 mg/mL ) Administered Intramuscular Manual Injection Subcutaneous Injection Using Auto-injector Healthy Post-menopausal Women
DOC.criteria: 1 . Naturally surgically postmenopausal woman , without intact uterus , age 50 75 year age , inclusive . FSH level great 40 mIU/mL 1 . Currently take estrogen/progesterone hormone replacement therapy ( HRT ) . 2 . History allergy sensitivity hydroxyprogesterone caproate , castor oil constituent study medication , history drug hypersensitivity intolerance 3 . Poorly control diabetes . 4 . History current evidence deep vein thrombosis , pulmonary embolism arterial thromboembolic disease ( e.g. , stroke , myocardial infarction ) . 5 . Known , suspect , current history carcinoma breast . 6 . Subjects past history breast cancer aromatase inhibitor selective estrogen receptor modulators . 7 . Known , suspect , current history hormone dependent tumor within last 5 year . 8 . Any current recent ( within previous 12 month ) genital bleed unknown etiology . 9 . Receipt investigational drug within 30 day . 10 . Receipt prescription OTC medication know alter CYP3A4 CYP3A5 level ( e.g. , carbamazepine , St. John 's Wort , ketoconazole , rifampin , ritonavir , alprazolam , azithromycin , loratadine , etc . ) within 14 . 11 . Any estrogen , progestin , selective estrogen receptor modulator ( SERM ) treatment within specified time window study start , range 2 6 month . 12 . High blood pressure screen evaluation , define systolic blood pressure > 150 mm Hg diastolic blood pressure > 90 mm Hg . 13 . History excessive alcohol consumption ( average 14 unit alcohol/week ) past 12 month . 14 . Use tobacco product within 30 day start study .
